text: Anriyum, "atamukku sujutu ceyyunkal" enru nam malakkukalitattil kuriyatai (napiye!) Ninaivu kurviraka appotu iplisaittavira, avarkal sujutu ceytarkal; avan (iplis) jin inattaic cerntavanaka iruntan; avan tan iraivanutaiya kattalaiyai miri vittan; akave ninkal ennaiyanri avanaiyum avan cantatiyaraiyum (unkalaip) patukappavarkalaka etuttuk kolvirkala? Avarkalo unkalukkup pakaivarkalaka irukkirarkal; akkiramakkararkal (ivvaru) marrik kontatu mikavum kettatakum
